title: Panel, velvet
description: Panel of cut velvet in rust-rose, green, and blue.  Central design of the double peach, bats, and lotus enclosed in a fret work border.  Main border of the rose velvet with a stylized cloud? design in blue.  Outer border of lotus and leaves in blue, pale rose, and tan.  Seamed up middle.  Lining of pink  cotton.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
